name: OR_LOG_INFECT_STAT
description: The OR_LOG_INFECT_STAT table contains OR management system log patient infection status.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the infection status refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the infection status in the surgical log.

columns.name: INFECTION_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which refers to the status of the infections that arose during the surgery in the surgical log.
